price: 19. Bawangani bino na maye bozali koloba, mpe bokozua esika ya kokima te mpe lisungi te. Mpe oyo akobuba o kati na bino, tokomekisa ye etumbu ya monene.
arabic: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسۡتَطِيعُونَ صَرۡفٗا وَلَا نَصۡرٗاۚ وَمَن يَظۡلِم مِّنكُمۡ نُذِقۡهُ عَذَابٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
